'''Starfell Sword''' is [[Traveler (Geo)]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|3.33}}
* In [[Co-Op Mode]], the other players are able to see the yellow targeting reticule when the Traveler is in the aiming mode.
* It is not possible to stack one meteor on top of another.<ref name="TQP">Event: [[A Thousand Questions With Paimon]]</ref>

;<big>Passive Effects</big>

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|2|Rockcore Meltdown}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|Everlasting Boulder}}
